issue.title: [CF 19] TellMeWhen causes a large number of LUA errors when enabled
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.98, Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7600.0

Installed Version

TellMeWhen 1.4.1

Description

Enabling TellMeWhen even with an extremely simple configuration causes a large number of continuous LUA errors. Here's one of the stack traces: Message: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1067: attempt to perform arithmetic on field 'updateTimer' (a nil value) Time: 10/17/10 10:34:57 Count: 1 Stack: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1067: in function `TellMeWhen_Icon_Buff_OnUpdate' Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:771: in function `TellMeWhen_Icon_StatusCheck' Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:702: in function `TellMeWhen_Icon_Update' Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:323: in function `TellMeWhen_Group_Update' Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:256: in function `TellMeWhen_Update' Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen_options.lua:45: in function `TellMeWhen_LockToggle' Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen_options.lua:18: in function `value' Interface\FrameXML\ChatFrame.lua:4127: in function `ChatEdit_ParseText' Interface\FrameXML\ChatFrame.lua:3717: in function `ChatEdit_SendText' Interface\FrameXML\ChatFrame.lua:2524: in function <Interface\FrameXML\ChatFrame.lua:2517> [C]: in function `UseAction' Interface\FrameXML\SecureTemplates.lua:274: in function `handler' Interface\FrameXML\SecureTemplates.lua:540: in function <Interface\FrameXML\SecureTemplates.lua:488> Locals: icon = TellMeWhen_Group1_Icon1 { 0 = <userdata> ShowTimer = false DurationAndCD = false InvertBars = false ShowCBar = false Unit = "player" OnlyMine = false cooldownbar = TellMeWhen_Group1_Icon1_Cooldown { } usableAlpha = 1 baseAlpha = 100 texture = TellMeWhen_Group1_Icon1Texture { } WpnEnchantType = "mainhand" presentAlpha = 0 ShowPBar = false absentAlpha = 1 CooldownShowWhen = "usable" BuffOrDebuff = "HELPFUL" UnitReact = 0 Name = "Fel Armor" powerbar = TellMeWhen_Group1_Icon1_Power { } countText = TellMeWhen_Group1_Icon1Count { } BuffShowWhen = "absent" Cooldown = TellMeWhen_Group1_Icon1Cooldown { } unusableAlpha = 0 } elapsed = 1 auraNames = <table> { 1 = "Fel Armor" } startTime = 0 timeLeft = 0 (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = 0 (*temporary) = 1 (*temporary) = "spell" (*temporary) = <table> { 1 = "Fel Armor" } (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = <function> defined =[C]:-1 (*temporary) = <table> { 1 = "Fel Armor" } (*temporary) = 1 (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = 1 (*temporary) = 2 (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = "attempt to perform arithmetic on field 'updateTimer' (a nil value)" percentcomplete = 1

Steps to Reproduce

1. Install a fresh TellMeWhen with no settings 2. Right click one of the empty icons and choose "Fel Armor" for the spell name (I'm a warlock, but any buff/debuff will do). 3. Set the type to buff/debuff 4. Set show when buff/debuff is absent 5. type /tmw in the chat window This prodcues 13 different LUA errors for me, one of witch is continuously hit.

Installed Addons

Addon Control Panel - 3.3.8 Are You Lookin' At Me? - 1.0.5 ArkInventory - 3.02.56 Atlasloot Enhanced - v5.11.06 AtlasLoot_GearScoreTooltip - AtlasLoot_GearScoreTooltip_v0.6 Auctioneer - Auctioneer Suite 5.8.4723 ButtonTimers - ButtonTimers 2.1 Carbonite - 3.34 Chatter - v1.2.9-3 ClassLoot - v1.7.2 Deadly Boss Mods - Deadly Boss Mods 4.62-r4564 Dominating - Dominating v0.11 Beta Dominos - 1.19.6 DrainSouler - 40000-1 DrDamage - 1.7.8_release DRTimers - DRTimers .1232 EavesDrop - v2.41 ForteXorcist - v1.966.2 FuBar 3.6 - v3.6.6 FuBar_PerformanceFu - v2.0.0 Fubar_WintergrasperFu - Fubar_WintergrasperFu v1.12.2 GearScore - GearScore 3.1.19 - Release Gladius - v1.2.0 Killshot - Killshot v1.17 KillStreak (PvPKillSound) - 3.2.0-v1.9b LibRock-1.0 - WoW-3.0-release-3 LifeTapper - LifeTapper-v0.99c LootAlert - LootAlert 22 MapCoords - 0.8 Mapster - 1.3.11 Minimap Button Frame - 3.1.2 Natur EnemyCastBar - Natur Ememy Castbar Omen Threat Meter - v3.0.11 Parrot - v1.10.20a QuestHelper - 1.4.1 QuickCoords - QuickCoords 2.21b - toc update Raid Roll (With EPGP support, roll tracker and loot tracker) - Raid Roll 4.4.16 (4.0.1 Compatible) RatingBuster - 1.5.0 Recount - v4.0.1b release Shadowed Unit Frames - v3.2.12 Spy - Spy v1.2 Target Class - Target Class v1.01 Target For Me - TFM 3.3.5a TellMeWhen - TellMeWhen 1.4.1 Tidy Plates - 5.13.5 TinyCasterStats - 1.3.0 TipTac - 10.10.14 Vanas KoS - v4.26


> Posted by CurseForge user iflassman | Imported from CurseForge issue #19 | Raw
